strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army of Space Marines from the Space Wolves Chapter.

sections.name: Space Wolves Core Packs
sections.description: At least one Grey Hunter Tactical Pack must be taken.

formations.name: 1+ Great Company
formations.units: One Captain, eight Grey Hunter Tacticals plus transport
extraUnits: Replace three Grey Hunter Tacticals with Long Fang Devastators: 50 points
Add up to three Leman Russ Exterminators: 50 points each

formations.name: Blood Claw Assault Pack
formations.units: Four Blood Claw Assaults plus transport

sections.name: Space Wolf Support Packs
sections.description: Two Support Packs may be taken per Core Pack

formations.name: Wolf Guard Terminator Pack
formations.units: One Captain, four Wolf Guard Terminators plus transport
extraUnits: Replace any number of Wolf Guard Terminators with Wolf Guard Assault Terminators: Free

formations.name: Swift Claw Recon Pack
formations.units: Three Swift Claw Assault Bikes, three Land Speeders

formations.name: Wolf Scout Recon Pack
formations.units: Four Wolf Scout Veterans plus transport

formations.name: Land Raider Pack
extraUnits: Add one Land Raider Wrath of Mjalnar to the formation: 125 points

formations.name: Predator Pack
formations.units: Four Predator Annihilators and/or Predator Destructors

sections.name: Space Wolf Aircraft and Freeblade Knights
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: 0-1 Freeblade Knight
formations.units: One Questoris Knight-Freeblade of any configuration

upgrades.title: Space Wolf Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to two Blizzard or Helfrost Dreadnoughts

items.name: Battle Barge
items.description: Replace the Strike Cruiser with a Battle Barge

items.name: 0-1 Supreme Commander
items.description: Replace the Captain with a Supreme Commander

items.name: Runekeeper
items.description: Add one Chaplain or Librarian to the formation

items.name: Anti-Air
items.description: Add any one of the following units to the formation

items.name: Land Raiders
items.description: Add any number of Land Raiders, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Razorbacks
items.description: Add any number of Razorbacks, up to the number required to transport the formation
